target.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.
target.name: evaluate_expression

target.code:
def tan_difference(tan_alpha, tan_beta):
    return (tan_alpha - tan_beta) / (1 + tan_alpha * tan_beta)
target.description: Calculate the tangent of the difference between two angles
target.name: tan_difference

target.description: Calculate angles of a triangle given its side lengths using the law of cosines, returning angles in degrees.

target.description: Calculate angles of a triangle given its side lengths and return in degrees.
